name: Bouncing Brothers
description:
Control two little slimes that are mirrored across the center of the screen!

Just because the movement is mirrored however, the twin sides of the levels are not! This leads to puzzle like gameplay that also requires some level of hand-eye coordination!  Please leave any feedback, as plan to continue working on this game after the weekly game jam this was made for!

Made for the 148th Weekly Game Jam.

Music by Goose Ninja

https://gooseninja.itch.io/
